Main.title: Adil Talasbek
Main.subtitle: Frontend Developer focused on creating great user interfaces; developing web applications using React and Next.js
Main.hr: HR agent? Here's a CV for you

project1.title: Artlumia
project1.description: Lending site for a video production agency.  During the development of the project on Astro, a comprehensive performance optimization was carried out. The delayed loading of content in Astro (lazy loading) was used, which increased the site speed by 27 times.

project2.title: KCMG
project2.description: Multi-page corporate website for a mining company. Features responsive layout, multilingual support, sliders, interactive diagrams, and CMS integration. The site is stable, fast-loading, and easily scalable.

project3.title: Atmosfera.spa
project3.description: The Atmosfera SPA website is clear and user-friendly, with intuitive navigation. It features information about services, reviews, and the spa center. Fast loading times and a well-structured layout ensure a smooth user experience.

project4.title: Gasyr140
project4.description: Online platform for Unified National Testing prep with registration, user dashboard, subscriptions, mock exams, and recommendation system. Features responsive layout, dynamic navigation, and backend integration.

project5.title: Gasyr140
project5.description: Gasyr140 is an online school for preparing students for the Unified National Test. It includes subscription management for paid users, an admission probability assessment for various universities, a leaderboard, an AI-powered virtual tutor for additional support, and a mock UNT exam. The website is designed to display video lessons, tests, and notes uploaded by teachers.

project6.title: Gorky Theater
project6.description: Multi-page theater website with playbill, ticket sales, and details about performances and cast. Implemented responsive layout, event filtering, and integration with an external booking system.

project7.title: Zypher
project7.description: A portfolio website for a video editor. Built with a minimalist interface, responsive layout, smooth scrolling, and animated sections. Utilizes custom animations with Framer Motion and optimized video loading. All elements are focused on showcasing the editor's style and work.

project8.title: Visa Group
project8.description: Landing page for a migration company with pixel-perfect and fluid layout. Features lead submission, responsive design, and smooth animations.

project9.title: YouAcademy
project9.description: Landing page for an online academy with pixel-perfect and fluid layout. Leads are sent to a Telegram bot and Google Sheets.

project10.title: Alieva Sabina
project10.description: Portfolio website for an opera singer with a captivating and atmospheric design. Features a fluid layout and immersive visuals. Lead submission through Telegram bot, emphasizing artistic presentation and user engagement.

Map.title: With a focus on globality
Map.subtitleTop: Geography does not limit the quality. I work with clients all over the world
Map.subtitleBottom: and make websites that convert, impress, and run smoothly.
